base module¶

Base module with connections between the python and the VHDL codes.

Author: Geoff Gillett

Define classes that will be used to make the communication between the python registers and the VHDL code. For further information, see “A Hardware Processor for Transition- Edge Sensors”, Dr. Geoff Gillet @ https://espace.library.uq.edu.au/view/UQ:e039de1

class base.Detection(value)¶

Bases: base.VhdlEnum

Value of the event.packet register.

area = 1¶
pulse = 2¶
rise = 0¶
trace = 3¶
